pages.title: Tall Oaks Trees
pages.text: Would you like a better chance at getting a tall oak tree? $(l)Use regular torches not redstone.$()

pages.title: Fool Proof Cobble Gen
pages.text: $(li)Waterlog the stair $(li)Place lava as shown $(li)Mine cobble!

pages.title: Better Waterwheels
pages.text: Want a more powerful Waterwheel? Use Soul Sand!
$(li)The red arrow points the direction of the waterwheel.$(li)The blue arrows show water source blocks.$(li)The white arrow shows soul sand.$(br2)This tip if done right will provide 320 SU.

pages.title: Get to Y -64 Alive!
pages.text: Making a $(l:videos_farms#mobs)mob farm$(/l) at the bottom of the world is best if you can remain alive. Here is a simple tip:$(li)Place a bucket of lava on the side of your island and let it flow to Y -65 (the void)$(li)Have a bucket of water ready and pick up the lava and place the water$(li)The remaining lava will become a cobble pillar$(li)Pick up the water when the pillar is formed
$(li)Place the water again, but 2 blocks away.$(li)Use the water as a ladder to desend$(li)At about Y -62 place some slabs or blocks on the side of the pillar$(li)Jump on placed blocks and don't die!

pages.title: End Portal
pages.text: To make an End Portal, stand in the middle of a 5x5 flat surface. looking in front of you skip one block then place an End Portal, then place one on the left and then on the right. Turn 90 degrees and repeat until you have place all 12 End Portals. If you make a mistake, use your Create wrench to shift-right-click on the End Portal to pick it up.

pages.title: Look Up Mods
pages.text: If you want to learn about a particular mod, then open the Mods menu page.$(li)From the main menu page, click on the  Mods icon. From within a world, open Game Menu page ($(o)default Esc key$()).$(li)Click on Mods.$(li)Search for the mod you are interested in.$(li)Click on the mod icon to show the details. You can find issue trackers, website links, and mod settings.
